title: Contemporary Duplex Retreat in Swidnica’s Historic Center
description: Experience superior living in this luxurious duplex nestled in the heart of Swidnica's coveted Historic Center. Spanning 145sqm, the property seamlessly blends sophisticated architectural form with practical elegance. The open-plan layout flaunts sun-drenched living spaces, pristine hardwood floors, and premium finishes. Three generous bedrooms and three designer bathrooms meet every need of the modern urban dweller ((including an elegant laundry room for convenience)). Entertain guests year-round in the private, well-appointed barbecue zone.
neighborhood_description: The Historic Center of Swidnica exudes a peaceful yet dynamic atmosphere, drawing top tech professionals and young creatives. Stroll among charming preserved facades, avant-garde cafes, or gain rapid access to the city via superb public transport connections and nearby highway routes. This neighborhood offers a rare combination of tranquil ambiance and innovative energy.
lifestyle_benefits: Walking proximity to coworking hubs and city culture
Ideal for remote work and after-hours relaxation
Effortless city escapes via highway access
Peaceful nights in a tech-driven, serene atmosphere
target_buyer: Trend-conscious young couples seeking a balance between dynamic careers and home sanctuary, who value urban connectivity as well as notable historical surroundings.
market_positioning: This duplex occupies a premium niche in Swidnica, pairing historical prestige and architectural sophistication, squarely aimed at professionals seeking quality, character, and excellent connectivity inside a peaceful yet progressive city quarter.
